dc_description_s: Administrative Regions (Provinces) in the People's Republic of China, 1997. 1997 CITAS Provinces  In 1997 the Province Level Municipality of Chongqing Shi was carved out of the eastern half of Sichuan Province. For the convenience of those wishing to represent PRC China Provinces from 1997 to present, we have created an unofficial Province level dataset with the post-97 areas of Sichuan Sheng and Chongqing Shi defined separately. Disclaimer: this is not an official version of the Sichuan and Chongqing boundaries, use at your own risk. -- text from CHGIS v4 CD-ROM.
